name: Game 69
description:
This is a small fps game basically can be finished in about 5min. This is my first try at a game like this and still learning the basic, i will be working on a new one maybe a zombie game to spice up some stuff.

Hope you guys enjoy it and that this game works like it suppose to. You get 3 lives to play the game or else it restarts.

If you get a weird warning when opening or launching the game it appears bcus itsnot an installed game and just a .exe game.
